"use client" import { useState } from "react" import Sidebar from "./Sidebar" import Header from "./Header" import EmployeeManagement from "./masters/EmployeeManagement" import EmployeeLogin from "./masters/EmployeeLogin" import BranchManagement from "./masters/BranchManagement" import ProjectManagement from "./masters/ProjectManagement" import RoleManagement from "./masters/RoleManagement" import EmployeeProfile from "./masters/EmployeeProfile" import VehicleEntry from "./inward/VehicleEntry" import SupplierDetail from "./inward/SupplierDetail" import PODetails from "./inward/PODetails" import UpdatedGRN from "./inward/UpdatedGRN" import Logs from "./Logs" const Dashboard = ({ user, onLogout }) => { const [activeSection, setActiveSection] = useState("dashboard") const [sidebarCollapsed, setSidebarCollapsed] = useState(false) const renderContent = () => { switch (activeSection) { case "add-employee": return case "employee-login": return case "branch": return case "project": return case "role": return case "employee-profile": return case "vehicle-entry": return case "supplier-detail": return case "po-details": return case "updated-grn": return case "logs": return default: return } } return (
setSidebarCollapsed(!sidebarCollapsed)} />
{renderContent()}
) } const DashboardHome = () => { return (
